reviews.review_msg: Briefly had this prof at UBC during covid. Canvas site posted late, putting behind in my new class after dropping his joke of a class (but it all worked, anything works better than a class with *ucker). Some hate recorded lectures; for me, zoom or recorded = ok. But what's not, is no lectures, all just copied/pasted readings. And no office hours

He is a nice enough guy, but he marks hard for no reason? It is a 100 level course but expects us to understand the content like this is our lives work. Don't expect to have anything graded in a timely manor. like at all. Lots of reading, and its dry AF for 80% of the course. Quizzes are stupidly specific for tiny details so read and take notes!

I really dislike this prof. He didnt respond to emails & isnt very helpful when you ask questions. His feedback makes no sense cause he uses a list of possible issues and bolds the one that applies to you with no examples or explanation. The fail exam was fine but just made me wish I hadnt gone to lecture cause it wasnt really related
